ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Update?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... have they changed. I have not noticed any changes as of yet and I am just wodering if all the debate and talk of strking is because people just don t like
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:31 AM 5/20/99 -0400, you wrote:
>I know that they havemad changes to the Enchanter Class but What exactly
have they changed. I have not noticed any changes as of yet and I am just
wodering if all the debate and talk of strking is because people just don't
like change or if it is actually as bad as people are saying. I have no
problem protesting if I believe the change was not for good. I would really
appreciate a run down on what they have changed. Someone made referance to
spells that were weekened. What did the spell do before the update and what
does it do now?
>
>Thanks
>Mushin
>

Whirl till you hurl was our only Unique type spell. It stunned a mob and
allowed us to keep fighting them. Totally nerfed it now stuns them only
until theya re stunned, which occurs with all our direct damage spells,
which our pet does, which all tanks basically do, etc. Also there is now a
random chance to break free each hit. Basically you waste 55 mana for 2
seconds of stunning.

Memory Blur. No damage, no stun, all it did was remove a mobs shit list. If
it was ana gro mob it would still come after you if you were in range. This
was however sueful for saving the lives of group members targeted by giants
or stuff, or getting a frenzied mob of a caster because it was unresistable.
After the change I cast it on a Dry bone skellie that was about 4 levles
above me and it wouldn't get off the tank who died. I soon followed. Spell
value is now zero since if its resistable why not just use mesmerize which
is also resistable and at least ahs a stun effect as well.

Removement of the Enchantment of light and brilliance.

Direct damage spells that ahve "stuns" that don't work, yet cause us to ahve
total resists instead of partial ones and a higher overall resist rate.

I could go on but I am pressed for time.
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725

will remove them, we Guarantee IT! Not responsible for damage
to persons or structures from use of this product.
